Command.Name: CmdPaste
Command.TooltipDescription: Paste the contents of the Clipboard.

Command.Name: CmdCut
Command.TooltipDescription: Cut the selection from the document and put it on the Clipboard.

Command.Name: CmdCopy
Command.TooltipDescription: Copy the selection and put it on the Clipboard

Command.Name: CmdFindGroup
Command.LabelDescription: Find text in current or multiple files

Command.Name: CmdZoom100Percent
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document to 100% of the normal size.

Command.Name: CmdWordWrap
Command.TooltipDescription: Select word wrapping option to change how text appears on your screen. This does not affect how the document looks when you print it.

Command.Name: CmdSaveAs
Command.TooltipDescription: Save the document with a new name or format.

Command.Name: CmdHeaderSave
Command.LabelTitle: Save a copy of the document

Command.Name: CmdRDocument
Command.LabelDescription: Save the document in the R format.

Command.Name: CmdPrint
Command.LabelDescription: Select printer, number of copies and other printing options before printing.

Command.Name: CmdQuickPrint
Command.LabelDescription: Send the document directly to the default printer without making changes.

Command.Name: CmdPrintPreview
Command.LabelDescription: Preview and make changes to pages before printing.

Command.Name: CmdViewOnePage
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document so that an entire page fits in the window.

Command.Name: CmdViewTwoPages
Command.TooltipDescription: Zoom the document so that two pages fit in the window.

Command.Name: CmdPreviousPage
Command.TooltipDescription: Navigate to the previous page of the document.

Command.Name: CmdNextPage
Command.TooltipDescription: Navigate to the next page in the document.

Command.Name: CmdClosePrintPreview
Command.TooltipDescription: Close print preview and return to editing the document.

Command.Name: CmdRSendFile
Command.TooltipDescription: Sends the entire file to R.

Command.Name: CmdRSendCursorToEndLine
Command.LabelDescription: Send content from cursor to end line to R
Command.TooltipTitle: Send content from cursor to end line to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendNavigator
Command.LabelDescription: Send selected navigator tree to R
Command.TooltipTitle: Send selected navigator tree to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendLinesToEndPage
Command.LabelDescription: Send lines to end of the file to R
Command.TooltipTitle: Send lines to end of the file to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendCurrentLineToTop
Command.LabelDescription: Send content from current line to top to R
Command.TooltipTitle: Send content from current line to top to R

Command.Name: CmdRSendCursorToBeginningLine
Command.LabelDescription: Send content from beggining line to the cursor to R
Command.TooltipTitle: Send content from beggining line to the cursor to R

Command.Name: CmdFilesRemoveAllOfGroup
Command.LabelTitle: Remove all files from selected group
Command.LabelDescription: Remove all files from selected group
Command.TooltipTitle: Remove all files from selected group

Command.Name: CmdRguiReturnFocus
Command.LabelTitle: Return focus to editor (after send/control Rgui)
Command.LabelDescription: Return focus to editor (after send/control Rgui)
Command.TooltipTitle: Return focus to editor (after send/control Rgui)

Command.Name: CmdDOSMinimizedAlways
Command.LabelTitle: Always shows console minimized when compiling
Command.LabelDescription: Always shows console minimized when compiling
Command.TooltipTitle: Always shows console minimized when compiling

Command.Name: CmdRtermIOHistory
Command.LabelDescription: Shows a popup menu with all commands recently send to R

Command.Name: CmdRtermIOSplitHorizontal
Command.LabelDescription: Horizontal split (IO and LOG in the same view)
Command.TooltipTitle: Horizontal split (IO and LOG in the same view)

Command.Name: CmdRtermIOSplitVertical
Command.LabelDescription: Vertical split (IO and LOG in the same view)
Command.TooltipTitle: Vertical split (IO and LOG in the same view)

Command.Name: CmdRtermIOSplitRemove
Command.LabelDescription: Remove split (IO and LOG in distinct view)
Command.TooltipTitle: Remove split (IO and LOG in distinct view)

Command.Name: CmdCloseDVIViewer
Command.LabelTitle: Close DVI viewer before Latex compilation
Command.LabelDescription: Close DVI viewer before Latex compilation
Command.TooltipTitle: Close DVI viewer before Latex compilation

Command.Name: CmdClosePDFViewer
Command.LabelTitle: Close PDF viewer before Latex compilation
Command.LabelDescription: Close PDF viewer before Latex compilation
Command.TooltipTitle: Close PDF viewer before Latex compilation

Command.Name: CmdRLibAddSnippet
Command.LabelTitle: Add code snippet to the library
Command.LabelDescription: Add code snippet to the library
Command.TooltipTitle: Add code snippet to the library

Command.Name: CmdCapitalization
Command.LabelDescription: Convert from and to lower/upper case
Command.TooltipTitle: Convert from and to lower/upper case
